page.title: 07BLEAN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Primary schools in this block have no religious bias,fees or compulsory uniform}{Blean}State,founded by K.C.C. 1929.{Staff} 11 {Pupils} 320(mixed) {Ages}5-11 {Subjects}:full range(inc. music,drama) {Facilities}:Sports:field (200x100metres) 2 netball courts, swimming pool. Leisure:Drama,chess computers,guitar,science,football, cricket,rounders.{Uniform}:brown,gold. Pupil's Monday morning:"We're usually told to do maths.We can either do Scottish Maths.Project and work from a book doing things like fractions, volume and long division.Or do Kent Maths Project using work cards(maths games,angles,area,base numbers and also things like algebra,more variety than there is in one S.M.P. book)...We hurriedly bustle out to play,then come back to physical education before lunch."
